== Pittsburgh Gutsy Gibbon Release Party ==

'''Date:''' Friday October 19, 2007 at Fox & Hound

'''Location:''' <nowiki>[[http://maps.google.com/maps?f=q&hl=en&geocode=&time=&date=&ttype=&q=Fox+and+Hound+Pittsburgh|Fox & Hound]]</nowiki>

'''Time:''' 7:00 PM

=== Come out and join us in celebrating Ubuntu's newest release. ===

This will just be a social event to start meeting fellow Ubuntu users in the Pittsburgh area.

The new <nowiki>[[MassachusettsTeam-Projects-AluminiumCaseBadges|aluminum Ubuntu case badges]]</nowiki> will be available for 50 cents each. The first 10 people to arrive will get one free. :)

Gutsy and Feisty CDs will also be available.

We have a reservation, ask for James if you can't find us.
